biotools.summary:
SIP: Significant Interaction Peak caller.Analysis of Hi-C data using SIP effectively identifies loops in organisms from C. elegans to mammals.


If you want run SIP with mcool file you need to install cooler: https://github.com/mirnylab/cooler (version >= 0.8.6) and cooltools: https://github.com/mirnylab/cooltools (version >= 0.3.0) . Not working with dev version of cooler and cooltools.
